EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Contact (= customer) when the new token has been generated.
EmailTemplate.name: Contact: AssistNow new token notification to Contact with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: u-blox Multi-GNSS AssistNow Service is activated for {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Thank you for your interest in u-blox' online, globally-available assisted GNSS service, AssistNow. The service ensures a fast Time-To-First-Fix when using u-blox GNSS receivers, even under poor satellite signal conditions.
The token you will require for initial setup of the service is below.
Token: {!Contact.MGA_Token__c}
A description of the AssistNow features and services can be found on the following web page:
http://www.u-blox.com/en/assisted-gps.html
Kind regards u-blox
